name: 1 Toss
description:
1 Toss is a tap-to-toss app for the iPhone and Apple Watch. You can choose coins from several countries, including the US, UK, India, Canada, China, Japan (＄, €, ₹, £, ￥), etc. More coins from all around the world will be added periodically.

This app comes in handy when tossing and making tough decisions. Good Luck!
